message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this exceptional product for $950,000. I believe it's a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know your thoughts!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to make sure it fits within my budget.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $850,000 is still significantly below what I need to sell this product. I'm willing to come down to $900,000, which reflects a considerable discount from my initial offer. I'm confident this product will be worth every penny for you.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I still think $850,000 is a fair price for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $875,000. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I understand your position, but $875,000 is still too low for me. I'm willing to go down to $890,000, which is a significant concession from my previous offer. It's a price that reflects the value of the product and allows me to make a reasonable profit. I'm hopeful we can close this deal at this price.

I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you at $860,000, which is the lowest I'm willing to go. I hope we can come to an agreement at this price.
